statements: SELECT * FROM student_progress;
SELECT student_id, course_id, completion_percentage, grade FROM student_progress;
SELECT student_id, grade, course_id, completion_percentage FROM student_progress;
SELECT student_id, completion_percentage, grade, course_id FROM student_progress;
SELECT course_id, student_id, grade, completion_percentage FROM student_progress;
SELECT * FROM student_progress WHERE completion_percentage > 90 ORDER BY grade ASC, course_id DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT student_id, AVG(completion_percentage) AS average_completion FROM student_progress GROUP BY student_id HAVING COUNT(course_id) > 3;
SELECT DISTINCT grade FROM student_progress WHERE grade IN ('A', 'B', 'C') ORDER BY grade DESC;
SELECT student_id, MAX(completion_percentage) AS highest_completion FROM student_progress WHERE grade = 'A' GROUP BY student_id;
SELECT student_id, course_id, completion_percentage FROM student_progress WHERE completion_percentage < 50 ORDER BY completion_percentage ASC, course_id ASC LIMIT 10;
SELECT * FROM course_progress
SELECT course_id, student_id, completion_percentage, grade FROM course_progress
SELECT * FROM course_progress WHERE completion_percentage >= 50
SELECT course_id, student_id, grade FROM course_progress ORDER BY course_id DESC
SELECT student_id, AVG(completion_percentage) AS avg_completion FROM course_progress GROUP BY student_id
SELECT * FROM course_progress WHERE student_id = 1;
SELECT course_id, student_id, completion_percentage FROM course_progress WHERE grade = 'A';
SELECT course_id, student_id, completion_percentage, grade FROM course_progress WHERE completion_percentage > 50 ORDER BY grade DESC;
SELECT course_id, student_id, AVG(completion_percentage) AS average_percentage FROM course_progress GROUP BY course_id, student_id;
SELECT course_id, student_id, grade FROM grades WHERE course_id IN (SELECT course_id FROM course_progress WHERE completion_percentage < 50);
SELECT * FROM students;
SELECT student_name, completion_percentage FROM students ORDER BY completion_percentage DESC;
SELECT student_id, student_name, grade FROM students WHERE grade = 'A';
SELECT course_name, course_description FROM courses ORDER BY course_name;
SELECT student_name, course_name, grade FROM students INNER JOIN grades ON students.student_id = grades.student_id AND students.course_id = grades.course_id;
SELECT * FROM students ORDER BY student_id DESC, student_name ASC
SELECT student_name, completion_percentage FROM students WHERE completion_percentage > 80

SELECT s.student_name, c.course_name, g.grade FROM students s JOIN courses c ON s.course_id = c.course_id JOIN grades g ON s.student_id = g.student_id AND s.course_id = g.course_id WHERE g.grade = 'A'

SELECT s.student_name, c.course_name, g.grade FROM students s JOIN courses c ON s.course_id = c.course_id JOIN grades g ON s.student_id = g.student_id AND s.course_id = g.course_id ORDER BY s.student_name ASC, g.grade DESC
SELECT DISTINCT s.student_name, c.course_description FROM students s JOIN courses c ON s.course_id = c.course_id
SELECT * FROM Students;
SELECT student_name FROM Students;
SELECT * FROM Courses WHERE course_name = 'Math';
SELECT student_name, Courses.course_name FROM Students JOIN Enrollments ON Students.student_id = Enrollments.student_id JOIN Courses ON Courses.course_id = Enrollments.course_id;
SELECT student_name, grade FROM Students JOIN Enrollments ON Students.student_id = Enrollments.student_id JOIN Grades ON Grades.enrollment_id = Enrollments.enrollment_id;
SELECT * FROM Students;
SELECT student_id, student_name FROM Students ORDER BY student_name ASC;
SELECT student_name, course_name FROM Students JOIN Enrollments ON Students.student_id = Enrollments.student_id JOIN Courses ON Enrollments.course_id = Courses.course_id;

SELECT student_name, course_name, enrollment_date FROM Students JOIN Enrollments ON Students.student_id = Enrollments.student_id JOIN Courses ON Enrollments.course_id = Courses.course_id WHERE enrollment_date >= '2022-01-01';

SELECT student_name, AVG(grade) AS average_grade FROM Students JOIN Enrollments ON Students.student_id = Enrollments.student_id JOIN Grades ON Enrollments.enrollment_id = Grades.enrollment_id GROUP BY student_name HAVING average_grade > 80;
SELECT student_name, grade FROM students WHERE completion_percentage > 80
SELECT * FROM courses WHERE course_name = 'Mathematics'
SELECT instructor_name FROM instructors ORDER BY instructor_name DESC
SELECT student_name, completion_percentage FROM students WHERE grade = 'A'
SELECT student_name, course_name, enrollment_date FROM students INNER JOIN enrollment ON students.student_id = enrollment.student_id
SELECT * FROM students WHERE completion_percentage > 80 ORDER BY student_name DESC LIMIT 5;

SELECT student_name, course_name, grade_value FROM students JOIN grades ON students.student_id = grades.student_id JOIN courses ON grades.course_id = courses.course_id WHERE students.completion_percentage > 70 AND grade_value >= 3.5 ORDER BY grade_value DESC, student_name ASC LIMIT 5;

SELECT student_name, instructor_name FROM students JOIN enrollment ON students.student_id = enrollment.student_id JOIN courses ON enrollment.course_id = courses.course_id JOIN instructors ON courses.instructor_name = instructors.instructor_name WHERE students.completion_percentage > 60 ORDER BY student_name LIMIT 5;

SELECT course_name, AVG(completion_percentage) AS average_completion FROM students JOIN courses ON students.course_id = courses.course_id GROUP BY course_name HAVING AVG(completion_percentage) > 50 ORDER BY average_completion DESC LIMIT 5;

SELECT instructor_name, COUNT(DISTINCT course_id) AS total_courses_taught FROM courses JOIN instructors ON courses.instructor_name = instructors.instructor_name GROUP BY instructor_name HAVING COUNT(DISTINCT course_id) > 2 ORDER BY total_courses_taught DESC LIMIT 5;
